about_the_game:
Cardinal Sequence is a roguelike deckbuilder inspired by space and sci-fi with a unique twist to how to play your cards. It is all about finding perfect synergies, organizing your cards and reaching scores beyond human readability.

A new way to play cards

Input a pattern of directions to match your card's in order to score as high as you can. Every card comes with unique effects and synergies to allow you to beat an ever increasing challenge. Carefully manage your cards to reach for the stars and beyond.

A relaxing space theme

Lean back as you sit in front of your view into space. Watch the stars pass while listening to relaxing, sci-fi inspired tunes. Take your time as you play your cards at your own pace and watch the stars fly by.

More to come...

The game is in active development and will see more content and new ways to play.
